question: Show me all hybrid marketing specialists and sales managers.
sql_query1:
SELECT JobPostings.Title 
FROM JobPostings
WHERE (JobPostings.Business_Profession = "Sales Manager" OR JobPostings.Business_Profession = "Marketing Specialist") AND JobPostings.Working_Arrangement = "Hybrid"
sql_query2:
SELECT JobPostings.Title 
FROM JobPostings
WHERE JobPostings.Business_Profession = "Sales Manager" OR JobPostings.Business_Profession = "Marketing Specialist" AND JobPostings.Working_Arrangement = "Hybrid"
interpretation1: Which sales managers work hybrid and which marketing specialists have the same work arrangement?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all sales managers and also provide a list of marketing specialists that work hybrid.
